import './Contenido_Huella_Estudiante_Nuevo.css' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import estudianteService from '../services/estudiante.service'; import axios from 'axios'; import _, { initial, range } from "lodash"; const Contenido_Huella_Estudiante_Nuevo = () => { const pageSize = 10; const [estudiantes, setEstudiantes] = useState([]); const [paginatedPost, setpaginatedPost] = useState(); useEffect(() => { estudianteService.getAll() .then(response => { console.log('printing the estudiantes data', response.data); setEstudiantes(response.data); setpaginatedPost() }) .catch(error => { console.log('Something went wrong', error); }); }, []); const pageCount = estudiantes ? Math.cei(estudiantes.length / pageSize) : 0; if (pageCount === 1) return null; const pages = _ - range(1, pageCount + 1) return (
